io.confluent.ksql.api.spi

Interface Endpoints

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KsqlServerEndpoints, TestEndpoints

    public interface Endpoints
    In order to keep a clean separation between the plumbing of the API server and actual back-end implementation of the endpoints we define this interface to encapsulate the actual endpoint implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • createQueryPublisher

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<QueryPublisher> createQueryPublisher(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties,
                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> sessionVariables,
                                                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> requestProperties,
                                                                            io.vertx.core.Context context,
                                                                            io.vertx.core.WorkerExecutor workerExecutor,
                                                                            ApiSecurityContext apiSecurityContext,
                                                                            MetricsCallbackHolder metricsCallbackHolder)
        Create a publisher that will publish the results of the query. This will be subscribed to from the API server and the subscriber will write the results to the HTTP response
        Parameters:
        sql - The sql of the query
        properties - Optional properties for the query
        context - The Vert.x context
        workerExecutor - The worker executor to use for blocking operations
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture representing the future result of the operation

      • createInsertsSubscriber

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<InsertsStreamSubscriber> createInsertsSubscriber(java.lang.String target,
                                                                                        io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject properties,
                                                                                        org.reactivestreams.Subscriber<InsertResult> acksSubscriber,
                                                                                        io.vertx.core.Context context,
                                                                                        io.vertx.core.WorkerExecutor workerExecutor,
                                                                                        ApiSecurityContext apiSecurityContext)
        Create a subscriber which will receive a stream of inserts from the API server and process them. This method takes an optional acksSubsciber - if specified this is used to receive a stream of acks from the back-end representing completion of the processing of the inserts
        Parameters:
        target - The target to insert into
        properties - Optional properties
        acksSubscriber - Optional subscriber of acks
        context - The Vert.x context
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture representing the future result of the operation
